text: Mace Alvin Neufeld (July 13, 1928 â€“ January 20, 2022) was an American movie and television producer. Neufeld was born in New York City. He produced The Hunt for Red October, Invictus and The Equalizer. Neufeld died on January 20, 2022. He was 93.Mace Neufeld, Producer of Jack Ryan, Equalizer Franchises, Dies at 93 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American television producers Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Mace Neufeld
